products.title: iPhone 12 Pro
products.desc: The iPhone 12 Pro features a new design and edge-to-edge Super Retina XDR display.

products.title: iPad Pro 12.9-inch (5th generation)
products.desc: The iPad Pro features the powerful M1 chip and a stunning XDR display.

products.title: MacBook Pro 14-inch
products.desc: The MacBook Pro 14-inch (2023) offers a Liquid Retina XDR display, powered by the M2 Pro chip, delivering breakthrough performance and amazing battery life.

products.title: iPhone 14 Pro Max
products.desc: The iPhone 14 Pro Max offers the best performance and largest display in the iPhone 14 series.

products.title: iPhone 14
products.desc: The iPhone 14 introduces an advanced dual-camera system and A15 Bionic chip.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra
products.desc: The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra offers a premium experience with its advanced camera and display.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip4
products.desc: The Galaxy Z Flip4 combines style and innovation with its unique foldable design.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy A53
products.desc: The Galaxy A53 offers a balance of performance and affordability, with a versatile camera.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S21 FE
products.desc: The S21 FE (Fan Edition) combines flagship features at a more accessible price point.

products.title: iPhone SE (3rd generation)
products.desc: The iPhone SE (3rd generation) offers powerful performance in a classic design.

products.title: iPhone 13 Mini
products.desc: The iPhone 13 Mini packs all the features of the iPhone 13 in a compact form.

products.title: iPad Air (5th generation)
products.desc: The iPad Air offers powerful performance with the A15 Bionic chip in a thin design.

products.title: iPad (9th generation)
products.desc: The iPad features the A13 Bionic chip and a 10.2-inch Retina display.

products.title: MacBook Air M2
products.desc: The MacBook Air with M2 chip (2023) features a redesigned thin and light chassis, with a 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display, and offers remarkable performance with incredible battery life.

products.title: MacBook Pro 16-inch
products.desc: The MacBook Pro 16-inch (2023) is a powerhouse for professionals, featuring the M2 Max chip for ultimate performance, a Liquid Retina XDR display, and a long-lasting battery.

products.title: MacBook Air M2 13-inch
products.desc: The MacBook Air M2 13-inch (2023) combines efficiency and power in a slim design, featuring a 13-inch Liquid Retina display, the M2 chip, and an all-day battery life.

products.title: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9
products.desc: The Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 9 (2023) is a premium ultrabook, offering a perfect blend of lightweight portability and high performance with its 14-inch display, Intel Core processors, and robust security features.

products.title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i
products.desc: The Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i (2023) combines versatility and performance in a sleek design, featuring a 13.3-inch QHD display, Intel Core i7 processor, and a robust battery life for on-the-go productivity.

products.title: Dell XPS 13
products.desc: The Dell XPS 13 (2023) is a compact and powerful laptop, featuring a 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and long battery life.

products.title: Microsoft Surface Pro 8
products.desc: The Surface Pro 8 is a versatile 2-in-1 device, featuring a 13-inch PixelSense Flow display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and the flexibility of both a tablet and a laptop.
